data.title: Adam Schlesinger Remembrance Thread
data.meta_description: Adam Schlesinger, Grammy- and Emmy-winning songwriter and co-founder of the band Fountains of Wayne, died today at the age of 52 due to complications from COVID-19. data.text:
Adam Schlesinger, Grammy- and Emmy-winning songwriter and co-founder of the band Fountains of Wayne, died today at the age of 52 due to complications from COVID-19. In my opinion, he was one of the true genius figures in modern pop music, and I am gutted that he left us so soon.

Here is a silly little song about a football instant replay that turns out to be a moving meditation on human transcendence:
